description: This file defines the NoteRepository class, which manages an in-memory collection of Note objects. It provides singleton access, and methods for adding, updating, deleting, retrieving, and searching notes based on query strings.

classes.name: NoteRepository
classes.description: Singleton class for managing notes in-memory, with methods to add, update, delete, get, and search notes.

methods.name: getInstance
methods.description: Returns the singleton instance of NoteRepository, creating it if necessary.

methods.name: getNotes
methods.description: Returns a sorted copy of the notes list, sorted by last updated timestamp in descending order.

methods.name: addNote
methods.description: Adds a new Note to the repository.

methods.name: updateNote
methods.description: Updates an existing Note identified by its id.

methods.name: deleteNote
methods.description: Removes a Note from the repository based on its id.

methods.name: getNoteById
methods.description: Retrieves a Note based on its unique id.

methods.name: searchNotes
methods.description: Performs a case-insensitive search within the titles and content of notes.
